main event: A single bright yellow oval-shaped object was observed for 3 seconds in the sky over Farmington, New Mexico.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a half dollar and bright yellow in color.
The object blinked out after 3 seconds of observation.
The sighting was made by a doctor from Farmington, New Mexico.
The report was submitted to various military intelligence agencies, suggesting the sighting was of potential interest.
The report concludes the sighting was possibly or probably astronomical in nature.
witnesses: a doctor from Farmington, New Mexico
